mapper.select: SELECT id, msg_type, title, content, click_type, click_url, standalone_mode, phone_no, `from`, `function`, publish_time, create_time, update_time, publish_status, fail_number FROM app_push_message WHERE (publish_time = '' OR publish_time is null OR publish_time <= SYSDATE()) AND publish_status in (0, 2)

SELECT id, msg_type, title, content, click_type, click_url, standalone_mode, phone_no, `from`, `function`, publish_time, create_time, update_time, publish_status, fail_number FROM app_push_message where DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{expirationTime} DAY) >= create_time
